Description.Text: The St. Regis Kuala Lumpur invites you to embrace your inner royalty at the most luxurious hotel in the city. Renowned for uncompromising service and unprecedented facilities, The St. Regis is a beacon of lavishness among the hotels in Malaysia. Our prestigious 5-star hotel in the heart of Sentral offers easy access to the Lake Gardens and the many sights to see in vibrant Kuala Lumpur. Every detail is set to an ambience of perfection. Bask in the ultimate comfort of our signature rooms and suites, fully appointed with floor-to-ceiling windows, walk-in wardrobe and spacious marble bathroom. Delight in the epicurean sensations brought to you by the master chefs at our many dining venues, every corner designed to reflect true opulence. Throughout your stay, Iridium Spa awaits to pamper you with a bespoke spa treatment to revive your mind, body and soul.

The St. Regis Kuala Lumpur ensures every need is catered to with its floor-to-ceiling windows, while the rooms offer exceptional views of the Lake Gardens and the KL skyline. All rooms boast a large seating area and walk-in wardrobe with abundant closet and luggage space. Each room also has a vanity table with ample lighting. A study desk equipped with HDMI media hub and international plug points are available. Speciality Suites feature an in-room Massage Room, Security Room for personal security detail, his-and-hers walk-in wardrobes and bathrooms. Suites can also be converted into multi-unit accommodations for groups and families. Room types in the hotels are as follows:
*Deluxe Room *Grand Deluxe Room *Metropolitan Room *St. Regis Suite *Caroline Astor Suite *John Jacob Astor Suite *Presidential Suite *Royal Suite

Enjoy an eclectic dining experience at The St. Regis Kuala Lumpur starting from The Drawing Room, featuring the monumental sculpture world-renowned artist, Fernando Botero has ever made - Botero Horse, which was specially commissioned for the hotel; to The Brasserie where seductive French cuisine meets Mediterranean. Sample the freshest sushi at Taka by Sushi Saito by the three Michelin star chef, Takashi Saito of Sushi Sait in Tokyo, or edo-style tempura at Ginza Tenkuni. End the night at The Astor Bar and Decanter, which offers an extensive menu of wine, whisky and champagne, as well as premium cigars; it can also be booked for exclusive wine-tasting sessions or relax in KL's coolest rooftop bar, Crystal, showcasing a 7m x 4m LED media canvas.
